DataTransfer.summary: The DataTransfer object is used to hold the data that is being dragged during a drag and drop operation. It may hold one or more data items, each of one or more data types. For more information about drag and drop, see HTML Drag and Drop API.

remarks.para: This object is available from the property of all .

-Drag and drop
-Drag Operations
-Recommended Drag Types
-DataTransfer test - Paste or Drag
